data.text: @leahhjay_ Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact with our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@iamhelenmanson Thank you for choosing THAI. 💜
@Tito_Djauhari @tiket  We invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise.

@danieltjiang Recently, we suspend all flights follow the announcement Extension of the temporary ban on all international flights to Thailand until 30 June 2020 from CAAT. We invite you to please send us a private message so we can better advise.
@Tito_Djauhari @tiket In this case, we would like to inform you that, the possibility of refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Flights to Thailand & More | THAI
urls.description: Thai Airways has service to 35 countries and offers online flight booking to popular domestic Thailand and International destinations.

data.text: @JoachimLindback We would like to suggest you follow the official flight announcement through https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q . If there are any changes, we will announce the announcement as soon as possible.
@Tito_Djauhari Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@thaimiller2019  We invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise.

Asia or Europe, which one do you plan to visit after COVID-19 is over? 🌎

Let's share your vote in the comment section!

#ThaiAirways #Asia #Europe #StayHomeStayFun

@ioop16 We are currently experiencing a high volume of requests, and the processing time is estimated to be longer than usual. Please be assured that we will contact you as quickly as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@JTRathmer 💜
@zoljargalmaa 💜

urls.title: THAICargo
urls.description: “THAI Cargo Terminal welcomes Vietnam Airlines, Hebei Airlines and Raya Airways as our new customer airlines in 2017.” Thank you for your support.

data.text:
Celebrating the 60th Anniversary of the inaugural flight to Hong Kong, we have been providing specialized care for your cargo since commencement of service and continue until the present day.

For more information, please visit https://t.co/HCzcJOgh4W

#ThaiAirways #THAICargo https://t.co/faM7fWwc7j

@pafbadz Hello. Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@mike8345 Hello, Michael. May we inquire what you may be concerned about?

@TommyB53576982 Due to the high volume of incoming requests, our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience this caused.
@harrietcz Due to the large volume of people who come in, the service waiting period may be slower than usual. We are truly sorry for the late response from our related department.
@MehtaYachna We recommend that you contact our Customer Relations Department at customer@thaiairways.com for issuing a confirmation letter regarding the delayed flight.
@MehtaYachna Could you please capture the screen about that error for our investigation?
@MehtaYachna We suggest that you contact the number (44 207) 907 9518, (44 207) 907 9520​, 44 (0) 330 400 4022 or 44-20-74917953
@MehtaYachna It would take 7-14 days depending on the volume of requests.
@MehtaYachna Have you filled and upload all required documents?
@MehtaYachna Due to the high volume of incoming requests,  the service waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience this opportunity may cause.
@MehtaYachna Do you have already sent your request via email to us, right?
@richardlaffan You are most welcome. Please Stay Home for reducing the risk of getting the virus and always wear masks.
@gottsgirl Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@jonrandy We would like to inform you that we still provide the service as usual.
@gottsgirl Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to.
@operao0605 Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.

@PranavArora1506 @ThaiAirwaysAust Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@thewarvys Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@thewarvys Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you.
@thewarvys Please contact our THAI office in your city of departure about this issue.
@watercove Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will contact you in the queue. Please wait for contact from our staff again. We apologize for the inconvenience.
@MehtaYachna Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@richardlaffan we understand that you've already submitted your refund request. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process the large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@RetoHWenger Please send an email to ropgold@thaiairways.com about this issue.
@thewarvys Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@TommyB53576982 We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process a large number of requests and queries received during this time. Please wait for them to get back. Thank you.

@TommyB53576982 we understand that you've already submitted your refund request. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process the large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@wittyfi Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Thank you.
@wittyfi If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. (2/2)
@wittyfi Greetings, we are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. (1/2)

@watercove We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information. However, if there are any updates, our staff will reply to you as soon as possible.
@Hatski_sez Greetings, could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

@Cream2610 ขอเรียนว่าทางตัวแทนจำหน่ายจะต้องมีการยื่นเรื่องเข้ามายังบริษัทเพื่อดำเนินการตามขั้นตอนซึ่งในสถานการณ์โควิด-19 มีผู้ติดต่อเป็นจำนวนมากจึงอาจทำให้ท่านได้รับบริการล่าช้า และขึ้นอยู่กับลำดับคิวที่ทางตัวแทนจำหน่ายยื่นเรื่องค่ะ ขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกมา ณ ที่นี้ด้วยนะคะ
@Cream2610 การบินไทยสวัสดีค่ะ ทีมงานขออนุญาตสอบถามเพิ่มเติมนะคะ ไม่ทราบว่าท่านได้สำรองบัตรโดยสารผ่านทางตัวแทนจำหน่ายหรือไม่คะ
@Felix_Witte You are most welcome. If you have any further inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us.
@Felix_Witte If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. (2/2)
@Felix_Witte Greetings, we are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. (1/2)
@JoachimLindback ็Hello, we will resume full operations once the Covid-19 situation subsides.  The travel voucher that can use normally.
@Demigur1 THAI will be able to conduct its normal business operations. We will resume full operations once the Covid-19 situation subsides.
@gottsgirl We would like to inform you that THAI will not be dissolved or go into liquidation or to be declared bankrupt. THAI will be able to conduct its normal business operations.

@w3ndysaputra We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information.  We suggest that you send an email to our THAI office at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
👉 https://t.co/pf0r96V0Wf https://t.co/7Walf6XkHn
@SinghalBhaskar If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@w3ndysaputra Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@SinghalBhaskar Please be informed that a refund amount will be calculated and settled by issuing office at least 180 days from the submission of your request.

@bubbleBO สวัสดีค่ะ เนื่องจาก THAI Contact Center อาจจะมีผู้ติดต่อเป็นจำนวนมากในขณะนี้ ทำให้ท่านไม่สามารถติตต่อได้ ทีมงานขออนุญาตแนะนำให้ท่านผู้โดยสารติดต่อใหม่อีกครั้งในภายหลัง หรือติดต่อหมายเลข 02 356 1188 ต่อ 91 หรือ 92 ค่ะ
@lindavanderwijk If you have already sent the form, a refund amount will be calculated and settled by issuing office at least 180 days from the submission of your request.

@BangkokDi The business will be conducted in parallel with the reform plan to increase operational efficiency and improve product and service quality.

THAI will resume full operations once the Covid-19 situation subsides. (2/2)

@BangkokDi We would like to inform you that THAI will not be dissolved or go into liquidation or to be declared bankrupt. THAI will be able to conduct its normal business operations including passenger and cargo transportation. (1/2)
@mieneke93424951 Greetings, We suggest that you contact the number +32-2-502-4744 or email reservations@thaiairways.be Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@lindavanderwijk If you need to refund We suggest you send an email to net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com or your travel agency directly.
@lindavanderwijk Greetings, We suggest you get the link https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn to request a travel voucher or extend ticket validity to your ticket.
@noorikhan778 If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.

@BangkokDi We mean all the process of ticket and booking will work normally. Once, you did the refund process, please wait for the officer to get back to you. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@normberetta You may send an email to contact@service.thaiairways.com
@BangkokDi Greetings, the refund, and your travel voucher can be used normally.
@noorikhan778 You may also contact our THAI offices worldwide - https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR via Email.  We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@normberetta Please contact reservations@thaiairways.co.uk
@gnom1408 ทีมงานขอขอบพระคุณมากค่ะ
@normberetta May we ask your city of departure?
@hyunUWU618 We already sent you a Direct Message.

@normberetta We would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure to change the time or date of flight at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
